/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are adorned with red banners and signs, adding a vibrant splash of color to the otherwise muted tones of the scene. A car can be seen driving down the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise static landscape. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene.
